attributes.action:
Cancel all restrictions brought in by Covid-19.
Allow informed self determinism
attributes.additional_details: There are many different viewpoints on how best to deal with Covid 19 and other similar viruses. I believe the government should be responsible for providing information and statistics to allow people to decide for themselves how to conduct their life. The vulnerable may well choose to isolate, others may choose to take the risk.
attributes.background:
Withdraw government guidelines and rules on the handling of Covid-19.
The government should provide national and local statistics and information allowing individuals to make their own informed decision on how they wish to conduct their lives with regards the virus.
